name: ong-platform-entrega4
description: ONG Platform - Entrega 4 (WCAG, GitFlow, Build, Deploy)

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/images && mkdir -p dist/css && mkdir -p dist/js
scripts.min:html: npx html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --minify-css true --minify-js true -o dist/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.min:css: npx cleancss -o dist/css/styles.min.css src/css/tokens.css src/css/base.css src/css/grid.css src/css/layout.css src/css/components.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:images && npm run copy:html && npm run min:css && npm run min:js && npm run min:html
